title: About Me
text: Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see https://quarto.org.

title: About Me
text: Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see https://quarto.org.

title: About Me
text:
Running Code
When you click the Render button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

1 + 1

[1] 2


You can add options to executable code like this


[1] 4


The echo: false option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).

title: Wong Chun Owen
text: I don’t have a nice picture of myself so …

title: Wong Chun Owen
text:
About
Studied in the field of IT for 3 years and had worked as an IT assistant in Setsco and ATT Systems for 5 months and 3 months respectively.
Search the link here to view more -> Portfolio

title: Wong Chun Owen
text:
Experience





Information Technology Assistant
ATT Systems Group · Internship
Mar 2020 - May 2020 · 3 mos
Singapore

Provide technical assistance and day-to-day operational support for the system at the office
Perform program requirements analysis, investigation, and troubleshooting to resolve any technical issues.
Support for hardware issues
Maintain IT documentation






Information Technology AssistantInformation Technology Assistant
Setsco Services Pte Ltd · Part-time Dec 2017 - Apr 2018 · 5 mos Singapore
Solve client issues, by installing programs, troubleshooting, fixing computers

title: My Project
text:
Mar 2020 - May 2020

With understanding from ATT System’s fault call handling, interaction with the site engineers, speaking to the HoD, and gathering their valuable feedback, I consolidated some improvement to the current IMS system, for example, the Man-Machine Interface (MMI) in the company system, the fault handing-Taking over by admin and Service Engineer.
After I volunteered to manage and look into improvement that can be made to the IMS, the Head of Department revealed that he had many pain points that he wanted to address. After further discussion, and in lieu of the remaining time I have in ATT Infosoft, he proposed two of his most painful points as his priorities, are ‘’Escalation’’ and “Stock inventory’’ features.
